Methods.Description: Initializes a new instance of the DextopException class.
Methods.Name: DextopException

Parameters.Description: The message that describes the error.
Parameters.Name: message

Methods.Description: Initializes a new instance of the DextopException class with a specified error message.
Methods.Name: DextopException

Parameters.Description: The arguments used to format the message.
Parameters.Name: args

Methods.Description: Initializes a new instance of the DextopException class with a specified error message.
Methods.Name: DextopException

Parameters.Description: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Parameters.Name: message

Parameters.Description:
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference
            (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
Parameters.Name: innerException

Methods.Description:
Initializes a new instance of the DextopException class with a specified
             error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of
             this exception.
Methods.Name: DextopException

Type.Description: Base exception class for all Dextop exceptions.
Type.Name: DextopException
